snippet.title: Atari 2600 Game:  Star Wars - Jedi Arena (1983 Parker Bros.)
snippet.description:
An action where you are in the arena. A seeker is wandering throughout the arena capable of firing laser bolts. To win the game, you need to destroy your opponent's shield by having the seeker fire laser bolts at it. You are only armed with a lightsaber which is used to control the direction of the laser bolts you fire, as well as block incoming fire from your opponent. The first player to break through the other player's shied wins a point, and the first player to earn 3 points wins the match. Several game options are included the control the speed of the seeker, or even make the seeker invisible.

Note: Hmmm! The controls did not seem to work or respond when I played this game. Not sure what happened.
